author: MatejKafka
body:
## Summary of the new feature/enhancement
Currently, when .psd1 is malformed and I use `Import-PowerShellDataFile`, I get a generic error:
```
Import-PowerShellDataFile: The file '<file>.psd1' could not be parsed as a PowerShell Data File.
```
This doesn't really help with finding the syntax error. I'd prefer if a normal syntax error would be returned, as with `.`, `&`, `Import-Module` and any other PowerShell file, which clearly shows location of the error.
title: Give useful syntax errors in Import-PowerShellDataFile
